mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (administrator_id, title, content, important) VALUES (#{administrator_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{important})
mapper.select:
SELECT notice.id, notice.administrator_id, notice.title, notice.content, notice.important, notice.reg_date, notice.del_date, admin.name AS admin_name FROM notice, administrator_info AS admin WHERE notice.administrator_id = admin.id
AND (admin.name like #{keyword} OR notice.title like #{keyword} OR notice.content like #{keyword})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM `notice` WHERE id = #{id} AND #{manageID} = (SELECT * FROM (SELECT administrator_id FROM notice WHERE id = #{id}) admin_id)
